languages.text: "Но ход твоих мыслей ускользает от меня, элантах. Одной рукой ты даруешь милость моим собратьям, другой — отнимаешь их жизни. Что это? Грех твоей души... или свойство крови, что течет в твоих жилах? Меня... пугает твое непостоянство".

"But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."
languages.original_text: "Но ход твоих мыслей ускользает от меня, элантах. Одной рукой ты даруешь милость моим собратьям, другой — отнимаешь их жизни. Что это? Грех твоей души... или свойство крови, что течет в твоих жилах? Меня... пугает твое непостоянство".

traits.locale_text: "But your train of thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kinsmen, yet toke their lives with the other. What is it? A vice of your own soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

"But your train of thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kinsmen, yet toke their lives with the other. What is it? A vice of your own soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

"But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

"But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

"But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

languages.text: “但我始终无法理解你的想法，外界人。你一手救下我的族人，一手却又夺走他们的性命。这到底是为什么？是灵魂的缺陷，还是血脉的遗毒？你的反复无常……令我恐惧。”
languages.original_text: "But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

traits.locale_text: “但我始终无法理解你的想法，外界人。你一手救下我的族人，一手却又夺走他们的性命。这到底是为什么？是灵魂的缺陷，还是血脉的遗毒？你的反复无常……令我恐惧。”

languages.text: «Pero no termino de comprender tu criterio, elantach. Con una mano otorgas clemencia a mi pueblo, y con la otra les arrebatas la vida. ¿A qué se debe? ¿Un defecto de tu alma... o de la sangre que corre por tus venas? Tu... veleidad me asusta».
languages.original_text: "But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

traits.locale_text: «Pero no termino de comprender tu criterio, elantach. Con una mano otorgas clemencia a mi pueblo, y con la otra les arrebatas la vida. ¿A qué se debe? ¿Un defecto de tu alma... o de la sangre que corre por tus venas? Tu... veleidad me asusta».

languages.text: « Mais je ne comprends pas votre manière de penser, elantach. D'un côté, vous faites preuve de clémence envers mon peuple, et de l'autre, vous n'hésitez pas à l'éliminer. Pourquoi ? Est-ce un défaut au creux de votre âme ? Ou dans le sang qui coule dans vos veines ? Votre inconstance... m'effraie. »
languages.original_text: "But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

traits.locale_text: « Mais je ne comprends pas votre manière de penser, elantach. D'un côté, vous faites preuve de clémence envers mon peuple, et de l'autre, vous n'hésitez pas à l'éliminer. Pourquoi ? Est-ce un défaut au creux de votre âme ? Ou dans le sang qui coule dans vos veines ? Votre inconstance... m'effraie. »

languages.text: "Aber ich verstehe Eure Gedankengänge nicht, Elantach. Mit einer Hand lasst Ihr meinen Leuten gegenüber Gnade walten, mit der anderen nehmt Ihr ihnen das Leben. Was soll das sein? Ein Makel Eurer Seele ... oder des Bluts, das durch Eure Adern fließt. Euer Wankelmut ... macht mir Angst."
languages.original_text: "But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich verstehe Eure Gedankengänge nicht, Elantach. Mit einer Hand lasst Ihr meinen Leuten gegenüber Gnade walten, mit der anderen nehmt Ihr ihnen das Leben. Was soll das sein? Ein Makel Eurer Seele ... oder des Bluts, das durch Eure Adern fließt. Euer Wankelmut ... macht mir Angst."

languages.text: 「しかし、エランタよ、あなたの考えの方向性が私にはわからない。片方の手で私のキンに慈悲を与えながら、もう片方の手で彼らの命を奪う。どういうことだ？お前の魂の欠陥か…それともお前に流れる血の欠陥か？あなたの気まぐれが…恐ろしい」
languages.original_text: "But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、エランタよ、あなたの考えの方向性が私にはわからない。片方の手で私のキンに慈悲を与えながら、もう片方の手で彼らの命を奪う。どういうことだ？お前の魂の欠陥か…それともお前に流れる血の欠陥か？あなたの気まぐれが…恐ろしい」

languages.text: "Düşünce yapını anlayamıyorum elantach. Bir elinle soyuma merhamet ederken diğeriyle canlarını alıyorsun. Nedir bu? Ruhunun bir kusuru mu yoksa damarlarında akan kandan mı? İkiyüzlülüğün beni korkutuyor."
languages.original_text: "But the direction of your thought eludes me, elantach. With one hand, you bestow mercy upon my kin, yet take their lives with the other. What is it? A flaw of your soul... or of the blood that flows in your veins? I am... frightened by your fickleness."

traits.locale_text: "Düşünce yapını anlayamıyorum elantach. Bir elinle soyuma merhamet ederken diğeriyle canlarını alıyorsun. Nedir bu? Ruhunun bir kusuru mu yoksa damarlarında akan kandan mı? İkiyüzlülüğün beni korkutuyor."
